overview:
David is co-founder of Oddsfutures.com.

David is a an internationally recognised academic and expert in the field of financial information theory, mathematics and statistics.

He regularly contributes to international publications such as RISK magazine and international conferences in these fields. Qualifications include; S.B., S.M, MIT, 1978, where his thesis advisor was Herman Chernoff; with M.Phil & Ph.D.â€™s from Columbia University,1983 where his thesis advisor was Nobel prize winner Herbert Robbins.

David Lives in Dublin, Ireland with his family.
